process

title: Allergy Intolerance Use Case

description: description

preConditions: The patient visits their GP and shows signs of inflammation. The GP will check for possible allergies, while presently there are no allergies registered for the patient.

postConditions: The patient's allergy information in the central vault is updated with a refuted allergy (which may or not be shown in the patient record).

process.title: Allergy Intolerance Use Case
process.preConditions: The patient visits their GP and shows signs of inflammation. The GP will check for possible allergies, while presently there are no allergies registered for the patient.
process.postConditions: The patient's allergy information in the central vault is updated with a refuted allergy (which may or not be shown in the patient record).
